summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1532, for the improvement of Eastlake Avenue, from Almy Street to Filmore Street; East Galer Street, from Eastlake Avenue to Franklin Avenue; Franklin Avenue, from East Galer Street to East Newton Street, by laying water mains of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 16604 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
